properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 9:23AM EST until February 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...

Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax
Counties
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County


Moderate flooding is still occuring along the Dan River from Paces
to South Boston. The Dan River at Paces has crested and will continue
to fall throughout the day. The Dan River at South Boston is expected
to crest this afternoon and begin to fall overnight.

Minor flooding continues along the Roanoke River at Randolph. The river
will continue to fall throughout the day and fall below flood stage early
Monday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph.
* until Monday afternoon.
* at 08AM Sunday the stage was 25.9 feet and falling.

* Flood stage is 24.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by early Monday
morning.
* Impact...at 25.0 feet...Water is several feet deep on portions of
River Road and Black Walnut Road.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 26.1
feet on Feb 25 2019.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.



The next scheduled statement will be issued by late this afternoon.
